name: Tower Defense or... Attack
description:
This was made for the Mini-Jam 111 : Colors². Thank you for looking at this page.

Gameplay :

The game is a tower defense, monsters follow a path and you have to kill them with towers that you place. The main difference here, to respect the limitation "The Player is his own enemy" , is that the play can choose whether he lets the monsters go to the village or no in order to gain population, power or money. The main goal of this game is to find balance between the three of them and there are 6 game over menus, hope you call try to get them all !

Note : 

This is my first game jam game and the second game I ever make in my life, it was hard and I couldn't put in everything that I wanted. I intend to pick up this project again later on with all my ideas, time and a better execution.  That said, I'm so happy that I've made it in time, the first day I thought it would be impossible but here we are.
